alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Coffey; Franklin; Lyon; Morris; Osage (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 14 at 2:55AM CDT until April 14 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR low humidity, gusty westerly winds, and dry fuels FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 037, 054, 055, 056, 058, AND 059... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 9 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 037, 054, 055, 056, 058, and 059. * WIND...West winds sustained 15 to 20 MPH with gusts up to 35 MPH this afternoon. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity is forecast to range from 17 to 21 percent. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
